document.full_text: axa , europe's second-largest insurer, launched a new five-year plan to boost profits and cut debt on wednesday, kicking off with the cash sale of its canadian unit for us$2.7 billion.
document.title: axa eyes profit boost, sells canadian unit
lines_and_colors: axa , europe's second-largest insurer, launched a new five-year plan to boost profits and cut debt on wednesday, kicking off with the cash sale of its canadian unit for us$2.7 billion.
